1.0.name: wordpress/wp-stats-view-counter
1.0.description:
Saves view counts from WordPress.com Stats Jetpack module (or WordPress.com Stats plugin) as post meta data. This can be useful for displaying view counts in your theme and building custom queries.

What makes this a better solution over other plugins that track views is that it simply pulls the data from WordPress.com Stats which is fairly accurate and already used on many sites, so this has very little overhead. It's a streamlined plugin that piggybacks off another which you might already be using.

Comes with a shortcode to display views and filter to change the post meta key where views are saved.

Thank you to Milan Dinić for improvements in the code after the initial release (and for the Serbian
